Get_Started.GET_STARTED_TEXT: With PageFly, you can build various types of Shopify pages, such as home, product and custom pages - all from scratch. All pages created are stored in the Manage Pages dashboard. If you need help, check out the
Get_Started.HOW_TUTORIAL_VIDEO: Getting Started With PageFly - Shopify Advanced Page Builder - PageFly Tutorial

Need_Help.CONTENT_1: Talk to us directly via live chat to get help with your question
Need_Help.CONTENT_2: Learn the best practices to build and optimize ecommerce sites with PageFly
Need_Help.CONTENT_3: Find a solution for your problem with PageFly documents and tutorials
Need_Help.CONTENT_4: Check our comprehensive video tutorials to get the most of PageFly

List_pages.MIGRATE_MESSAGE: Your page is outdated, please save your page with the New Editor before use this function.

Page_Settings.TOOLTIP_PAGE: A standalone page, landing page or subpage for a marketing campaign or your store promotion.
Page_Settings.TOOLTIP_HOME: A stunning brand-new introductory page for your store.
Page_Settings.TOOLTIP_COLLECTION: An add-on to attach more content to your current Shopify collection page, or a new one to fully replaces Shopify default collection page.
Page_Settings.TOOLTIP_PRODUCT: An add-on to attach more content to your current Shopify product page, or a new one to fully replaces Shopify default product page.

Page_Settings.TOOLTIP_BLOG: A custom entry to promote marketing content, your products or your brand.

Billing_Message.BILLING_MESSAGE_1: We are launching new pricing plans and your Free account has been upgraded to a new Free plan with all features available! As a loyal user, you can still edit all pages you created, while new users can only edit 1 page for each page type.
Billing_Message.BILLING_MESSAGE_2: Let's take a look at our new pricing plan!
Billing_Message.BILLING_MESSAGE_3: We are launching new pricing plans and your account has been upgraded to Platinum plan - the highest plan with unlimited pages and all features unlocked! As a loyal customer, you get this upgrade for FREE, no surcharges.
Billing_Message.BILLING_MESSAGE_4: With PageFly, you can build various types of Shopify pages, such as home, collection, product and custom landing pages.
Billing_Message.GETTING_STARTED_WITH_PF: Getting Started With PageFly - Advanced Page Builder
Billing_Message.BILLING_MESSAGE_5: If you need help, check out the Help Center or have a 24/7 live chat with us.
Billing_Message.DOWNGRADING_PLAN: Your account has been downgraded to the ${planName} plan!
Billing_Message.BILLING_MESSAGE_6:
On the ${planName} plan, you are limited with just 01 page each page type, 01 saved section and 03 page versions.
All PageFly pages that you have created are reserved, but only 01 page of each type is available for editing.
Billing_Message.BILLING_MESSAGE_7: To be able to edit all existing pages and create an unlimited number of new pages, please upgrade to the Platinum plan!
Billing_Message.THANK_FOR_SUBS: Thank you for subscribing to our ${planName} plan!
Billing_Message.BILLING_MESSAGE_8: Your subscription fee will be listed on the upcoming Shopify bill.
Billing_Message.BILLING_MESSAGE_9: You can now create an unlimited number of pages with PageFly. Let's create some awesome pages and get sales!
Billing_Message.BILLING_MESSAGE_10: If you have a large number of pages, please consider upgrading to Platinum plan to create as many pages as you wish.
Billing_Message.NOTICE_OF_FREE_PLAN: You are currently on the old Free plan which allows you to edit all existing pages. If you choose to upgrade to any paid plan and after that downgrade to the Free plan, then you will be downgraded to the current Free plan where only 01 page per page type can be edited.
Billing_Message.NOTIFICATION_COVID: COVID-19 Response:To help merchants get over this crisis, PageFly offers a limited 20% discount on all plans. Upgrade now to benefit from the discounted recurring charge every month, even when the offer is over.
Billing_Message.PRICE_TOOLTIP: You will get this price for every charge until the subscription is cancelled!

Plan.PLAN_TITLE: Choose the plan that suits you best
Plan.PLAN_TITLE_DES: You can switch between paid plans anytime and only pay the price difference during the app charge cycle.
Plan.FREE_DESCRIPTION: Effortless page building tool for everyone
Plan.SILVER_DESCRIPTION: Optimal solution for building landing pages
Plan.OUR_CUSTOMERS: Our customers love what we do
Plan.PF_ACHIEVEMENTS: PageFly is doing superbly and got some big achievements:
Plan.ASK_SUPPORTER: Ask our supporters via Live Chat
Plan.FAQ_ANSWER_1: All PageFly pages that you published stay up and running seamlessly. However, only a limited number of pages can be edited based on the plan you want to downgrade to.
Plan.FAQ_QUESTION_2: What happens to my pages if I uninstall PageFly?
Plan.FAQ_ANSWER_2:
All PageFly pages that you published stay up and running seamlessly. However, you will not be able to edit or add any new elements to them. 
If you ever change your mind, simply reinstall PageFly and edit your pages with our editor.
Plan.FAQ_ANSWER_3: The monthly charge for PageFly is handled by Shopify along with its monthly billing. You can freely upgrade / downgrade between paid plans and only pay the price difference during the app charge cycle. Read more about billing.
Plan.FAQ_ANSWER_4:
Shopify experts are Shopify ambassadors who actively help merchants grow their business by providing high-quality services. 
PageFly is proudly built by Shopify experts, who are using their expertise to guarantee high conversion rate and success for merchants.
Plan.FAQ_QUESTION_5: If I am not satisfied, can I get my money back?
Plan.FAQ_ANSWER_5: Definitely! If you are not satisfied, feel free to ask for a refund within 30 days from your purchase date.. Just submit a ticket at our Help Center or via Live Chat in PageFly app, we will ask Shopify to give you a full refund.
Plan.FAQ_QUESTION_6: What exactly is “24/7 Live Chat Support”?
Plan.FAQ_ANSWER_6: It literally means that. We have support representatives from 5 countries covering all 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Anytime you need help, just reach out to us via Live Chat in PageFly app.
Plan.DATE_INPUT_WARNING: The entered date is not correct, please try again.
Plan.DOWNGRADE_SILVER_PLAN:
By selecting ${plan} plan, you will be limited with a certain amount of pages, saved sections and page versions.

Are you sure you want to downgrade?
Plan.DOWNGRADE_FREE_PLAN:
By selecting ${plan} plan, you will be limited with just 01 page each page type, 01 saved section and 03 page versions.
Moreover, Shopify will cancel the current app charge and won’t give back application credit for unused days. Learn more about how Shopify billing work.

Are you sure you want to downgrade?
Plan.DOWNGRADE_LOWER_PLAN:
By selecting the ${plan} plan, you will be limited with a certain amount of pages, saved sections and page versions.

Are you sure you want to downgrade?
Plan.TOOLTIP_ALL_PAGE_ELEMENTS: From basic to advanced elements to help you build your own pages without design and programming skills.
Plan.TOOLTIP_ALL_PAGE_TEMPLATES: Pre-made hi-quality page designs for various niches from our CRO experts to help you get started quickly.
Plan.TOOLTIP_CUSTOM_CODE: Add custom JS / CSS to your page for extra functionality and styling.
Plan.TOOLTIP_SAVED_SECTIONS: Save any page section and reuse it later.
Plan.TOOLTIP_VERSION_HISTORY: Review and restore certain page versions in the past if needed.
Plan.TOOLTIP_PRICING_REGULAR_PAGE: Regular Page allows you to create a wide range of pages such as landing, sales, promotion, contact, about us, testimonial pages, etc.
Plan.TOOLTIP_PRICING_HOMEPAGE: With PageFly, you can create a homepage with rich content, attractive design and mobile ready. You can choose one of pre-made beautiful page templates to get started quicker.
Plan.TOOLTIP_PRICING_COLLECTION: Collection Page allows you to add more content to your current collection page. You can also choose to hide the default collection page generated by your theme and have a fully customized collection page.
Plan.TOOLTIP_PRICING_PRODUCT: Product Page allows you to add more content to your current product page. You can also choose to hide the default product page generated by your theme and have a fully customized product page.
Plan.TOOLTIP_PRICING_BLOGPOST: Blog Post Page allows you to create blog post with rich content, attractive design and mobile ready. You can choose 1 of 50+ page template to get started quicker and easier.
Plan.TOOLTIP_PRICING_PASSWORD: Password Page allows you to have appealing passwords / coming soon pages with effective elements like countdown timer, banners, etc.

Analytic_Tab.CONSENT_MESSAGE_2: We use cookies to collect data for the Page Analytics feature and enhance general user experience. Without your consent, some features will not work.
Analytic_Tab.CONSENT_MESSAGE_3: To find out more, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
Analytic_Tab.TABLE_NO_DATA_MESSAGE: There is no data for this table.
Analytic_Tab.VIEW_NO_DATA_MESSAGE: There is no data for this view.
Analytic_Tab.SET_UP_TRACKING_MESSAGE: Please set up Tracking ID for your CTAs on this page to see this metric.
Analytic_Tab.NOTIFICATION_ANALYTIC: Analytics feature is enabled automatically for all pages created in version 2.9.0 and later. Pages created before that need to be republished to start having analytics.
Analytic_Tab.PERCENTAGE_VALUES_TOOLTIP: All percentage values are counted as average of all days in the date range
Analytic_Tab.TOOLTIP_ADD_TO_CART: The percentage of visitors who added a product from the page to the cart.
Analytic_Tab.TOOLTIP_REVENUE: The total amount of revenue generated by the page.
Analytic_Tab.TOOLTIP_CONVERSION_RATE: The average percentage of visitors who clicked on trackable CTAs on the page.
Analytic_Tab.TOOLTIP_PRODUCT_VIEWS: The percentage of visitors who moved next to a product details page from the page.
Analytic_Tab.TOOLTIP_TIME_ON_PAGE: The average amount of time in minute all visitors spent on the page.
Analytic_Tab.TOOLTIP_VISITORS: The total number of unique users visited the page.

Toolbar_and_richText.THERE_IS_NO_LINK: Error! There is no link to remove!

Tranfer.EXPORT_ALL_IN_PAGE_TYPE: All pages in this page type
Tranfer.EXPORT_DESCRIPTION: Images used in the page will NOT be exported. You will need to download images and then upload them individually via Image Manager in the destination page.
Tranfer.EXPORT_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: I understand that images will not be exported.
Tranfer.IMPORT_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: I understand that images will not be imported.
Tranfer.IMPORT_WARN_MESSAGE_1: You need to upload a valid PageFly data that has been exported from PageFly.
Tranfer.IMPORT_WARN_MESSAGE_2: NO images will be imported. You will need to download images from the original store and then upload them individually via Image Manager in the page.
Tranfer.WRONG_JSON_FILE_MESSAGE: File format is not valid, please choose a .json file
Tranfer.TOAST_ERROR_INVALID_DATA: Invalid data, please check your file.

Joomla.RECIPIENT_EMAIL_HINT: Enter the recipient email address. This field is mandatory. Without a ecipient email, your form will use the value of the From Email parameter in the Global Configuration page. If you want to set a list of recipient emails, then each email must be separated by comma character.
Joomla.FROM_NAME_HINT: Text displayed in the From header when sending email(s). This field is optional. If it is blank, then the value of the From Name parameter in the Global Configuration page will be used.
Joomla.RECIPIENT_EMAIL_HINT: Enter the recipient email address. This field is mandatory. Without a ecipient email, your form will use the value of the From Email parameter in the Global Configuration page. If you want to set a list of recipient emails, then each email must be separated by comma character.
Joomla.USE_BCC_HINT: If this parameter is enabled, each recipient will see only his/her email in the To field of the notification email sent to him/her.
